extension.description: Heeltemal oor ontwerp om 'n moderne aansig te skep, terwyl die klassieke Aeon gevoel behou word.
Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
Täielikult uuesti disainitud, et luua tänapäevane välimus samas säilitades klassikaline Aeoni tunnetus.
Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeonilta.
Complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l’esprit classique d’Aeon.
Totalement revu pour créer un look moderne, en gardant l'expérience Aeon.
Redeseñado completamente para crear unha aparencia moderna ao tempo que mantén a sensación do clásico Aeon.
עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
Pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Helt redesignet for å tilby en moderne utforming, samtidig som den klassiske Aeon-følelsen er beholdt.
Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon-gevoel.
Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
Complet reproiectat pentru a crea o înfățișare modernă, dar totuși păstrând atmosfera clasică Aeon.
Полностью переработан, чтобы создать современный облик, сохраняя при этом классическое чувство Aeon.
Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Modern görünüme kavuşturmak için baştan tasarlandı, klasik Aeon hissi korundu
Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.
完全的翻新設計以創造現代化的視覺感受，同時仍維持Aeon的經典外觀。
extension.news: [I][COLOR FFFF9800]v8.0.1[/COLOR][/I][CR]- Use Weblate for translations (thanks gade01)[CR]- Fix Embuary error when navigating to a TV Show Season[CR]- Add a clean paused screen option to Video OSD settings[CR]- Re-add script.grab.fanart support[CR]- Fix missing sortby labels[CR]- Add status indicator settings for BigFan[CR]- Fix Rick Dangerous error[CR]- Default letter jump fixes[CR]- Tweak MyFlix info for Episodes[CR]- Fix auto hide OSD options duplicating in other settings[I][COLOR FFFF9800]v8.0.0[/COLOR][/I][CR]- New status indicators[CR]- Add verified from Kodi Repo image + Rework language flags[CR]- Cleanup overlays + Updated HD/SD/3D indicators[CR]- Fix lyrics being covered by background for normal lyrics[CR]- Add missing buttons to DialogAddonInfo and PVRInfo[CR]- Fix typo in set ratings for UK:PG[CR]- Fix 4K Widget cases not appearing[CR][CR][B]All updates may contain various changes and/or improvements[/B][CR]For a more complete list visit:[CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master[/COLOR][/I]

0.7.6 - Create french translation (thanks @ludovik35) - Add EPG icon in PVR Guide Info (thanks @ludovik35) - fix: black borders in square wall (thanks @codeflorist) 0.7.5 - Revert previous changes in Image_Landscape 0.7.4 - Fixed icon visibility for pvr 0.7.3 - Fixed forced view - Fix for ratings not showing in video osd - Changed default to colorful for rating icons 0.7.2 - Added option to disable channel label in pvr guide 0.7.1 - Fixed text being truncated - Fixed posters being cut off

extension.description: This is a light mod of Arctic Zephyr 2 by heppen. Arctic Zephyr 2 is a minimalistic skin created by jurialmunkey and moded to work with Kodi 19 Matrix by pkscout. The skin is designed to be simple so that the user can focus on their media content. In addition to the default light colour scheme, the skin also includes a number of darker variations.

Jest to modyfikacja skórki Arctic Zephyr 2 autorstwa heppen. Arctic Zephyr 2 jest minimalistyczną skórką stworzoną przez jurialmunkey i zmodowaną do pracy z Kodi 19 Matrix przez pkscout. Skórka została zaprojektowana jako prosta, aby użytkownik mógł skupić się na swojej zawartości multimedialnej. Oprócz domyślnego jasnego schematu kolorów, skórka zawiera również kilka ciemniejszych wariantów.

extension.summary: Scraper module for AKL plugin.
extension.description: This module can be used as a scraper plugin for AKL. It can be used to scrape metadata and assets from The Games DB (TGDB).

extension.description: This module can be used as a scraper plugin for AKL. It can scrape games from the SteamGridDB database.
extension.news: [UPPERCASE]Current[/UPPERCASE][CR]- Support for new module (sources)

extension.summary: Mobygames scraper for AKL plugin.
extension.description: This module can be used as a scraper plugin for AKL. It can scan metadata and assets from the Mobygames database.

extension.summary: Launch ROMs from AKL with Retroarch
extension.description: Launcher plugin for AKL. This plugin is used by AKL to be able to launch ROMs using the Retroarch Emulator.
extension.platform: android freebsd ios linux osx windows
extension.news: [UPPERCASE]Current[/UPPERCASE][CR]- Support for sources (new module)[CR]- Updated to support new args approach for executors.[CR]- Fixed Android execution for Kodi Nexus.[CR]- Android storage issue fixes[CR][UPPERCASE]Previous releases[/UPPERCASE][CR]- Updated documentation.[CR]- Optimized addon settings.[CR]- Updated dependencies.[CR]- Joystick system now suspendable.

extension.summary: Default plugins for AKL.
extension.description: Default plugins for AKL. Needed to have basic functionality with AKL. Supports scanning directories for certain files. Launching these files using selected applications.
extension.news: [UPPERCASE]Current[/UPPERCASE][CR]- Added direct file launcher[CR]- Supporting new source types[CR]- Updated to programs based file browser.[CR][UPPERCASE]Previous[/UPPERCASE][CR]- Added joystick suspend option.[CR]- Minor bugfixes.

extension.summary: Steam scanner, scraper and launcher for AKL plugin.
extension.description: This module can be used as a scanner, scraper and launcher plugin for AKL. It can scan and launch games from your Steam library. It can scrape assets for games available on Steam.
extension.news: [UPPERCASE]Current[/UPPERCASE][CR]- Added support for new sources[CR]- Added scraper[CR][UPPERCASE]Previous[/UPPERCASE][CR]First official release of this Steam plugin for AKL.

extension.description: Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded basiert auf dem original Arctic: Zephyr Skin von jurialmunkey und ist ein minimalistisches, klares und simples Interface für deine Medien mit dem gewissen Etwas.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded is based on original Arctic: Zephyr skin, created by jurialmunkey. Arctic focuses on being simple, clean and minimalistic with a light spin.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded is based on original Arctic: Zephyr skin, created by jurialmunkey. Arctic focuses on being simple, clean and minimalistic with a light spin.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded is based on original Arctic: Zephyr skin, created by jurialmunkey. Arctic focuses on being simple, clean and minimalistic with a light spin.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded est basé sur le skin original Arctic: Zephyr, créé par jurialmunkey. Arctic se focalise sur le fait d'être simple, claire et minimaliste.

extension.summary: Start any emulators/apps from Kodi.
extension.description: Gaming front-end and general application launcher for Kodi. Supports scanning, scraping and launching of ROMs and games, using many plugins. Easily extendable with lots of plugins or create your own.
extension.platform: android freebsd ios linux osx windows
extension.news: [UPPERCASE]Current[/UPPERCASE][CR]- Fixed launching standalone sources[CR]- Several fixes by mallexxx[CR]- Moved default asset paths to edit assets/artwork menu[CR][UPPERCASE]Previous[/UPPERCASE][CR]- Separated launchers[CR]- Implemented sources[CR]- Search term mode applicable for multi ROM scraping[CR]- Refactoring of default asset mapping[CR]- Collections now use import rules from sources

extension.summary: Library module for AKL plugin.
extension.description: Python module to be used as a library for AKL plugins.
extension.platform: android freebsd ios linux osx windows
extension.news: [UPPERCASE]Current[/UPPERCASE][CR]- Fix Application launcher not launching the app (fixed by: mallexxx)[CR]- Cleanup log; case insensitive APPPATH, APPBASE[CR]- Addon command utilities[CR]- Windows LNK file execution fix[CR]- Added extras fields to scraped data[CR]- Use asset filenames that are allowed by system[CR]- Generalized addon commands and parsing[CR][UPPERCASE]In previous releases[/UPPERCASE][CR]- Don't download assets of extension type [I]url[/I][CR]- Updated media/artwork[CR]- Fixed ok dialog issue with timer[CR]- Added PEGI rating support[CR]- Less logging by requests module, making logs more secure[CR]- Added file dialogs support[CR]- Fix for storing single ROM launcher settings

extension.summary: Nvidia Gamestream scanner and launcher for AKL plugin.
extension.description: This module can be used as a scanner and launcher plugin for AKL. It can scan and launch games from your Nvidia Gamestream library. This plugin needs and is executed from within AKL.
extension.news: [UPPERCASE]Current[/UPPERCASE][CR]- New addon command and args support[CR]- Added support for Moonlight-QT[CR]- Updated to new module (sources)[CR][UPPERCASE]Previous[/UPPERCASE][CR]- Added support for Sunshine gamestream server[CR]- Added more system data from scanning[CR]- Certificate and pairing tools now available as pip module
